channel.title: Can you
channel.description: can someone give me the link for a tut on updating ur server without shutting it down or at least saving char files so i can shut it down and compile and re-run server... if you don't understand what i want lol its a tut for making/adding a command to save char files so i can turn off server and compile it and turn it back on... please help me out :)

Do you know what?
I can’t be fucking arsed with this little 10Rep who claims to know what he is on about, for one im 15. Your probably younger. You call it coding and it is blatantly Programming. JAVA PROGRAMMING.

item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

[quote author=boomer4456 link=topic=298555.msg2398221#msg2398221 date=1219273761]

STOP POSTING MORE AND MORE THREADS ON THE SAME THING AND SOMEONE WILL FUCKING HELP YOU.

  1. Learn basic java.
  2. Learn how programming private servers works.
  3. Add char saving into your update command and USE your update command before updating.
    [/quote] harsh

Not really, you should learn basics before you start ATTEMPTING to program.
Everyone knows it, the fact is, you people just skip basic Java straight to the server tutorials!
You don’t even have a clue what your doing. It’s all copy paste copy paste for you…
[/quote] OK first of all its called coding…

HAHAHA!
CODING?!

It’s Programming, you should LEARN JAVA. Then return here.
hahahahaha…
[/quote] ahahahahahah you stupid noob it is called coding the whole fucking scource is java based IDIOT AND I BET YOU DONT KNOW SHIT ABOUT JAVA AND TRYING TO ACT SLICK ON A RUNESCAPE CHEATING FORUM LOL 10 YEAR OLDS THESE DAYS

item.title: Can you
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:6, topic:227202”][quote author=p e e p z i link=topic=298555.msg2398043#msg2398043 date=1219270505]
This is a command it reboots the server } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("reboot")) // I'll use this to save all player profiles before booting the server :) { PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;

So you can compile then do ::reboot and it saves the players games
[/quote]
To fix that up -.-…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("reboot")) // I'll use this to save all player profiles before booting the server :) { PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; }[/quote]

Someone else with sense.
I’m going crazy seeing all his posts.

Read full topic

item.title: Can you
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“p e e p z i, post:3, topic:227202”]This is a command it reboots the server } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("reboot")) // I'll use this to save all player profiles before booting the server :) { PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;

So you can compile then do ::reboot and it saves the players games :)[/quote]
To fix that up -.-…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("reboot")) // I'll use this to save all player profiles before booting the server :) { PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; }

Read full topic
